ABOUT GRACE MUYIWA

With a passion for design that began at a young age, I've spent the last decade honing my skills to become an accomplished web designer and developer. After years of working at leading agencies, I founded Rare Designs - a personal branding venture dedicated to elevating businesses through stunning yet strategic online presences.

My philosophy is simple - craft digital experiences that don't just look great,but drive real results. Every website I create is a harmonious blend of sleek visuals, optimal user experience, and purposeful functionality tailored to my client's goals.

Whether you need a new business site, e-commerce platform, or full rebranded web presence, I have the expertise to make it a reality.

From the initial design concept to the final launch, my process is highly collaborative. I take the time to understand your brand's core identity, target audience, and conversion objectives. Using those insights, I meticulously design and develop a website that captures your brand's essence while delivering an immersive user journey. I specialize in responsive web design, ensuring your site looks stunning and performs flawlessly across all devices. With a keen eye for UI/UX and mastery of front and back-end development, you can expect pixel-perfect websites optimized for search engines and conversions.
When you partner with me, you're not just getting another vendor - I become an invested extension of your team. My commitment is to your success through memorable online branding and engagement. If you're ready to make your mark with a truly rare digital presence, let's talk.
